answers.answer: Dear Scared Girl,I want you to know that I am not a medical professional, just a mom of a 16 year old who was diagnosed at the age of 21 months.  You need to verify any information that I give to you with your healthcare team.  I also want you to go to your mother and tell her exactly what you've told me, that you are worrying yourself sick.  She needs to know how you feel.  There is a test that can be done that will put your mind at rest, so you know where you stand as far as being diabetic or not.  Please don't hesitate as this is something that you need to determine right away.Good luck to you and please let us know how you make out.

question: my sister works at a camp and it is a diabetic camp even thouggh she is not diabetes and she brought home a tester for blood sugars and i tried it and my reading read 20.7 i now that is high but my mom is a diabetic nurse and said nothing really when i asked her. the only thing is that i am sick with this thing were i throw up anything i eat and am dehydrated i 13 5 foot 3 sort of chubby very healthy excersie a tone but this is not the fuirst time this has hapend i8 tested yester day and i was 17.2 so it has gone up but i am scared got any advice???????
title: i don't know if i have diabetes pleeeeeeeeeese help me and fast!!!
